newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Banco Comercial Portugues shares up on H1 hopes.
newsitem.headline: Banco Comercial Portugues shares up on H1 hopes.

text.p: Shares in Banco Comercial Portugues (BCP) were gaining 3.4 percent, boosted by the improved market mood and expectations for good first half profit figures, traders said.
"The outlook for the first half results is good," said one trader. BCP, Portugal's largest quoted bank, is expected to issue its first half figures next week.
Analysts are looking for full year profits of 27-28 billion escudos, up from 23.3 billion in 1996.
